comment._content: This is the mall at Parham and Patterson in Richmond near Regency Square.

comment.author: 28298823@N08
comment._content: It's called the Beverly Hills Shopping Center.

comment.author: 55169086@N07
comment._content: Yep. The Beverly Hills shoping center. To the left of the Colonial Store was the Ben Franklin %& dime store owned my Mr. Strang. I had my first Job there. Lived on wetherly righ behind the Colonial and just crossed the street and junped the fence. The sign on the Gulf Station could be seen from Patterson and Three Chopt., where the Village Shopping Center is now located. This was not a mall but a shopping center.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: Ack! I'm probably in one of the stores. Exactly right, Beverly Hills S.C., with Strang's Ben Franklin and the Colonial Store. The Colonial, Ben Franklin, and Lafayette Pharmacy space are now occupied by a Ben Franklin Craft Store.

comment._content: I worked Pt at the gulf opened by two UR student after their graduation around 1958-9
